homepage.description: Main page components for the website

hero.description: Main banner section with compelling headline and call-to-action

header.description: Navigation bar with logo, menu, and user actions

halfTextHalfImage.description: Section with text content and image side by side

propertySlider.description: Carousel section displaying property cards in a slider format

ctaValuation.description: Call-to-action section with valuation content and image

stepsSection.description: Section displaying steps or process in a grid layout

whyChooseUs.description: Section displaying features and reasons to choose the service

testimonials.description: Section displaying customer testimonials and reviews in a carousel format

contactMapSection.description: Section displaying a map for contact information

footer.description: Footer section with company information, links, and contact details

grid.description: Grid layout for displaying property cards in a responsive grid

filterButtons.description: Filter buttons for property status (available, sold, rented) with inspection request button

propertyFilter.description: Search and filter form for properties with location, type, and price filters

mapSection.description: Interactive map section with markers, info windows, and customizable content overlay

contactFormSection.description: Contact form section with social media links and contact form

contactCards.description: Contact information cards with icons, titles, and content

propertiesPage.description: Complete properties listing page with filter, search, and grid components

inputs2.description: Dynamic form system with customizable cards and fields with visibility controls
